name: Grow Token
description: GROW is the governance token of the Triathon project, used for participating in project governance and community development. Triathon is the primary provider of foundational AI and application security capabilities in the Trias ecosystem, operating as the Web3 artificial intelligence model training platform. Triathon specialises in providing computational power to the AI space, leveraging existing community-trained secure AI models. It has launched an automated security agent service that includes seven products for code review and smart contract detection. Users who participate in training AI models and providing computing power receive project tokens as a community reward.
